titleStmt.title: A pleasant new song that plainely doth show that al are beggers, both high and low, a meane estate let none despise for tis not money that makes a man wise to the tune of Cuckolds all a row / Humfrey Crowch.
titleStmt.author: Crouch, Humphrey, fl. 1635-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Pr]inted by M.F. for R. Harper, and are to be sold at the Bible and [?] in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Bound and filmed with STC 5129.5, 6791.5, 6792.3, 6921.5 and 10611.7.
Imperfect: torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Manchester Central Library.
